message: An alarm blares. The space begins to distort.
I brace myself for an attack... only to gasp when Noiz appears in front of me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Noiz?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Man, what the fuck is going on?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "How did you get here?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "You forget who you're talking to?"
Noiz walks up to me with a smirk.

name: ノイズ
message: "I forced this field open. The others should be here soon... plus a few uninvited guests."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba!"

name: クリア
message: "Master!"
The alarm sounds again, then Koujaku, Clear, and Mink appear.
This time, the alarm doesn't stop.

name: ノイズ
message: "Here they come."
Security guards swarm the field, together with their Allmates.
It's not just one squad, either.

name: 蒼葉
message: "They keep coming..."

name: ノイズ
message: "When I forced the field open, it was like widening the mouth of a vacuum."

name: ノイズ
message: "Now it's sucking up everyone who was in the area."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That sounds like a total disaster!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Not like I had a lotta time to play."
Still, something's strange. The guards are just standing there. It's their Allmates who are showing obvious hostility.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Aren't they acting a little weird?"

name: ノイズ
message: "It's an Allmate bug."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: ノイズ
message: "It's been around for a while, but the symptoms suddenly started hitting hard this morning."

name: ノイズ
message: "It's caused by a new worm that makes the bug worse. It's all over the news."

name: ノイズ
message: "The worm makes Allmates go berserk. But the really weird thing is that, apparently, it also turns their owners into zombies."

name: ノイズ
message: "You know how when you register an Allmate, you have to sync it to your ID chip? I think it's got something to do with that."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So, because we're connected to our Allmates wirelessly, the bug that corrupts them corrupts us too?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Yeah. They keep putting out new models of Allmate, but for some reason, they never fixed that bug that's been there since the beginning."

name: ノイズ
message: "Now, if he planned for this and deliberately slipped the bug into the Allmates, then Toue's one demented psycho."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Maybe that bug has something to do with what happened to Ren..."

name: ミンク
message: "Allmates affected by the bug start leaking a crystalline substance from their eyes."
That's exactly what happened to Ren...

name: 蒼葉
message: "So that was because of the bug..."

name: 紅雀
message: "It happened to Ren too?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey. Isn't there something we can do?"

name: ノイズ
message: "They said something about a vaccine on the news, but I don't buy it."
...There's only one thing to do.
I look at everyone in turn.

name: 蒼葉
message: "There is a way to help him."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll explain later. If I'm gonna save Ren... I need to use Scrap on myself."

name: ノイズ
message: "...What?"

name: クリア
message: "Master..."

name: 紅雀
message: "You're going to use it on yourself? Can you even do that?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I won't know until I try. I'm... not sure this is gonna work, but it's the only chance I've got. If I don't do it now, I'll never get another."

name: ミンク
message: "You're not making sense."

name: ノイズ
message: "Plus, if you use Scrap on yourself here and lose consciousness, the game will treat it as a loss and log you out. It's pointless."

name: クリア
message: "He's right, Master. It's too dangerous."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I know it's dangerous. That's why I need your help. Please."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Back me up while I'm out."
